timeline.bodyHTML:
I think this should be java.specification.version rather than java.vm.specification.version.

There is a minuscule possibility that the System.getProperty call could return null and then the EE.highestFromTargetVersion call will NPE. So this should probably be:

.orElseGet(() -> Optional.ofNullable(System.getProperty("java.specification.version"))
    .flatMap(EE::highestFromTargetVersion)
    // if that all fails at least we know bnd needs at least
    // Java 8 at this point
    .orElse(EE.JavaSE_1_8));
timeline.author: bjhargrave
